attributes.action: Independent functional review of Action Fraud.
attributes.additional_details: Fraud is costing the UK £130bn a year. IT is imperative we have effective measures to recover funds and shut down the criminals else we are inviting further operators to utilise the UK as an easy target.
attributes.background: Reform the system in order the correct specialist resources are allocated to this. Action fraud have proven ineffective in dealing with cases and are not fit for purpose.
